item.title: Enthusiastic Amateurs and Overcoming Institutional Inertia
item.content:
I was very pleased but also slightly embarrassed when Dave Pattern invited me to speak at the Mashed Library UK 2009 event (also known as ‘Mash Oop North‘). Pleased because this event, which is building on the success of theÂ  first event which took place at Birkbeck College in November 2008, reflects the interests I […]
